p: In 1916, Madison Grant, another well-known conservationist (Purdy 2015), published The Passing of the Great Race, which Adolf Hitler went on to laud as his ‘bible’; the book has also influenced the hate speech of contemporary white supremacists (Serwer 2019). While the Sierra Club has since denounced the racist views of Muir,3 the racist origins of the environmental movement have had lasting legislative and political ramifications.
